entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
